column1: Even in the case of provocateurs
column2: it can be an effective strategy to call their bluff
column3: by offering them a chance to have a rational conversation. In this case
column4: the failure to do so is their responsibility alone.#No-platforming hinders productive discourse.#0

column1: A country used to receiving ODA may be perpetually bound to depend on handouts (pp. 197 [60]).#Government structures adapt to handle and distribute incoming ODA. As the funding from ODA is significant
column2: countries have vested bureaucratic interest to remain bound to aid (pp. 197 [61]).#1

column1: ChatGPT will reach AGI level before 2030.#To reach AGI it should be able to generate its own goals and intentions: where would it draw these from?#0
